channel.title: Stat on Battle of Brothers
channel.description: Recent content in Stat on Battle of Brothers

item.title: Another Shot at the Intro Video
item.description: I said I wouldn’t do it, but I couldn’t help myself and took another crack at the intro video. The main practical reason is because the game’s music is being composed, and it kind of all derives from the intro song. The main impractical reason is because I hated the first video and couldn’t help myself from trying again. Here’s look at the second attempt.
